UserAccount.title: UserAccount
UserAccount.description: Represents a user account within the SoulSync app.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account.

username.description: The username of the user account.

email.description: The email address of the user.

dateJoined.description: The date and time the user joined the app.

partnerAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount of the linked partner. Null if not linked. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:1 UserAccount)

Avatar.title: Avatar
Avatar.description: Represents the customizable avatar of a user.

userAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount that owns this avatar. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:1 Avatar)

hairStyle.description: The selected hair style for the avatar.

faceType.description: The selected face type for the avatar.

eyeType.description: The selected eye type for the avatar.

clothing.description: The selected clothing for the avatar.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message exchanged between partners.

senderAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount of the message sender. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:N Message)

recipientAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount of the message recipient. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:N Message)

timestamp.description: The date and time the message was sent.

StatusUpdate.title: StatusUpdate
StatusUpdate.description: Represents a user's status update (e.g., studying, eating).

id.description: Unique identifier for the status update.

userAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount that posted the status. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:N StatusUpdate)

statusType.description: The type of status (e.g., studying, eating, sleeping).

timestamp.description: The date and time the status was updated.

Gift.title: Gift
Gift.description: Represents a gift that can be sent to a partner.

imageUrl.description: URL to the image representing the gift.

cost.description: The cost of the gift in in-app currency.

Purchase.title: Purchase
Purchase.description: Represents a purchase of a gift by a user.

buyerAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount that made the purchase. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:N Purchase)

recipientAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount that will receive the gift. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:N Purchase)

giftId.description: Reference to Gift that was purchased. (Relationship: Gift 1:N Purchase)

purchaseDate.description: The date and time of the purchase.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

userAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount the notification belongs to. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:N Notification)

type.description: The type of notification (e.g., new message, gift received, friend request).

timestamp.description: The date and time the notification was created.

isRead.description: Indicates whether the notification has been read by the user.

PartnerRequest.title: PartnerRequest
PartnerRequest.description: Represents a partner link request between users.

id.description: Unique identifier for the partner request.

requestingAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount that sent the request. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:N PartnerRequest)

requestedAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount that received the request. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:N PartnerRequest)

status.description: The status of the partner request (e.g., pending, accepted, rejected).

timestamp.description: The date and time the request was sent.

RoomItem.title: RoomItem
RoomItem.description: Represents furniture or decorations in the partner's room.

id.description: Unique identifier for the room item.

description.description: A brief description of the item.

imageUrl.description: URL to the image representing the room item.

cost.description: The cost of the room item in in-app currency.

UserRoom.title: UserRoom
UserRoom.description: Represents the items in a user's room.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user room.

userAccountId.description: Reference to UserAccount that owns the room. (Relationship: UserAccount 1:1 UserRoom)

roomItemIds.description: References to RoomItems in the user's room. (Relationship: RoomItem N:N UserRoom)

firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore structure is designed to support the features of SoulSync, a long-distance relationship app, focusing on partner linking, messaging, gift-giving, status updates, and interactive affection.  The design emphasizes authorization independence and clear security rules.

Key features of the design include:

1.  **User Accounts and Partner Linking:**  User accounts are stored in `/userAccounts/{userAccountId}`.  The `partnerAccountId` field directly links partners, supporting partner linking functionality. A separate `/partnerRequests` collection manages link requests.
2.  **Avatar Customization:** Avatars are stored in `/avatars/{avatarId}`, with each avatar associated with a `userAccountId`. This supports avatar customization and display.
3.  **Message Exchange:**  Messages between partners are stored in `/messages/{messageId}`. The `senderAccountId` and `recipientAccountId` fields clearly define the message's sender and receiver, facilitating message delivery and display.
4.  **Status Updates:** User status updates are stored in `/statusUpdates/{statusUpdateId}`, associated with a specific `userAccountId`. This allows users to set and display their current status.
5.  **Gift Giving and Purchases:**  Gifts are defined in `/gifts/{giftId}`. Purchases, linking buyers, recipients, and specific gifts, are stored in `/purchases/{purchaseId}`. This facilitates gift-giving between partners.
6.  **Notifications:** Notifications are stored in `/users/{userAccountId}/notifications/{notificationId}` to ensure only the owning user has access.
7.  **User Rooms:** User rooms are stored in `/users/{userAccountId}/rooms/{roomId}`, making it easy to display furniture bought by user.
